headers.subject: Fake profile
headers.received: (from crawler@localhost) by crawl-1.a.markmail.int (8.13.8/8.13.8/Submit) id m7EJFFjv013975 for kay.michael.daniel@a.markmail.org; Thu, 14 Aug 2008 12:15:15 -0700
headers.x-authentication-warning: crawl-1.a.markmail.int: crawler set sender to root@localhost using -r
headers.x-http-useragent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 2.0.50727),gzip(gfe),gzip(gfe)

body.para: Someone had created a fake profile for one of my friends sister, her cell phone is posted on that profile.. And posted all dirty info about her and to contact her for all dirty messages / calls. She is receiving many SMS every day and phone calls on the number displayed on that profile. So I kindly request you to delete that profile at the earliest. She is not aware of Internet at all. She has her final exams this month and because of these dirty calls/messages she is shocked and cannot concentrate on her studies.
If possible kindly do let me know what is the email address used to create that profile or any other info related while creating that account.
